name: Vikings vs. Dragons
summary:
When the dragon blitzkrieg begins and and you’ve got nothing but a bundle of blood-soaked arrows and your half-frozen Viking brethren at your side… will you be ready?
Note: Vikings vs Dragons works best on iPhone 4S and above.
Defend the land of your ancestors in this Scandinavian epic. Combine your melee, magic, and garrison defense in a concerted, strategic effort to protect the legacy of your people.
